availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hiram F. Bowen (Kenton County, Kentucky, master carpenter)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, master carpenter. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Bowen. Father of Matilda Bowen, William Bowen, Woodford Bowen, Harriett Bowen, Laura Bowen, and Edward Bowen. Master carpenter in Kenton County in 1860. Sheriff in Kenton County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 2, p. 607.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 2, p. 3B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 6th Congressional District, Vol. 3, June and July 1863, p. 15, p. 31 of microfilm, (Accessed via ancestry.com on April 1, 2020).
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1863,” in 1864 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 10. (Frankfort, Ky.: Wm. E. Hughes, State Printer, 1864), 137.
Find A Grave, "Hiram F. Bowen (1822-1899)," Memorial 86170772, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/86170772 (accessed April 1, 2020).
